articles.title: These Are the Coolest Laptops We've Seen at CES 2026 - CNET
articles.description: Laptops this year will get new processors, but many computer makers are turning back the clock with designs that are easier to repair and upgrade.

articles.title: Motorola reveals the Razr Fold, a book-style foldable launching this summer - Ars Technica
articles.description: Motorola is light on details but heavy on hype for its first book-style foldable.

articles.title: Lenovo’s new concept rollable could be the ideal gaming laptop - The Verge
articles.description: The Lenovo Legion Pro Rollable concept is a high-end gaming laptop with a 16-inch OLED screen that expands to a 24-inch ultrawide. And boy, does it look great.

articles.title: Lenovo’s second SteamOS handheld is the Legion Go 2 - The Verge
articles.description: Lenovo will sell the Legion Go 2 handheld with Valve’s SteamOS in June 2026, starting at $1,199.

articles.title: Our Favorite Home Tech Gear That Everyone's Talking About at CES 2026 - CNET
articles.description: CES 2026 is here, showcasing some cutting-edge new gear to on-the-ground reporters from CNET.

articles.title: HP’s EliteBoard G1a is a Ryzen-powered Windows 11 PC in a membrane keyboard - Ars Technica
articles.description: The most familiar, full-fledged PC experience you can get from a keyboard.

articles.title: The Inevitable Rise of the Art TV - WIRED
articles.description: New televisions from Amazon, Hisense, TCL, and others are designed to display fine art and look like a painting when they’re switched off. It’s all thanks to smaller living spaces and new screen tech.

articles.title: Wi-Fi 8 is appearing at CES before most of us have switched to Wi-Fi 7 - The Verge
articles.description: Wi-Fi 8 devices made a surprise appearance at CES 2026, including a quirky new router and two new series of chips launching this year.

articles.title: My Clicks Communicator Hands-On: Boldly Going Where Phones Have Been Before - CNET
articles.description: The new Android handset is meant to be a secondary phone optimized for messaging, with a BlackBerry-like physical keyboard, headphone jack and other features lost to time.

articles.title: How (not) to recycle those old gadgets - The Washington Post
articles.description: E-waste can be transformed into essentials if you’re willing to think outside the box.

articles.title: Hazie’s bartender fired after viral incident - Gazetteer SF
articles.description: Miguel Marchese was terminated from his position over email on Saturday

articles.title: This 16-inch laptop is so light I can easily lift it with three fingers - The Verge
articles.description: Asus is introducing an ultra-light Zenbook A16 to accompany its refreshed A14 model.

articles.title: Two Chrome Extensions Caught Stealing ChatGPT and DeepSeek Chats from 900,000 Users - The Hacker News
articles.description: Security researchers found two Chrome extensions with 900,000 installs secretly collecting ChatGPT and DeepSeek chats and browsing data.

articles.title: I played Resident Evil Requiem's terrible prequels so you don't have to - Polygon
articles.description: Alyssa Ashcroft made her series debut in Resident Evil Outbreak, a dated multiplayer game that's a nightmare to play now

articles.title: You might mistake Satechi’s new Thunderbolt 5 hub for Apple’s Mac Mini - The Verge
articles.description: Satechi has revealed the Thunderbolt 5 CubeDock, a Mac Mini-style dock that offers an NVMe SSD enclosure along with three Thunderbolt 5 ports.
